message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can finish the game quickly!
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I'm not going to be too generous just yet.
It's time to be more realistic. 50/50 is a fair split, don't you think?
I'll take a bit more, but I'm still willing to compromise.
I'm starting to think you're not serious about finding a fair split. 60/40 is the minimum I'll accept.
I'm not budging, but I'm willing to give you a small token of my good faith.
I'm not going to let you walk all over me. 80/20 is the minimum I'll accept, or I'll take everything.
I'm not going to let you bully me into a bad deal. This is my final offer.
I'm taking what's left. You've had your chance to negotiate, now it's my turn.
I'll take a tiny bit, just to spite you, but I'm not going down without a fight.
I'm not going to waste any more time. I'm taking the last bit of value left. You've had your chance.
I'll take almost everything, but I'll give you a tiny bit. It's the best I can do.
